Layer manipulation controls

Back to index

The layer manipulation controls provide controls for creating new raster layers, renaming layers, and deleting layers.

  • Clicking the create new layer button creates a new raster layer and adds it to the layer list.
  • The rename button allows for the selected layer to be renamed. Clicking the buttons opens a prompt, in which the user can enter a new name.
  • The delete button deletes the currently selected layer, removing it from the layer list and the canvas.
